pr_title: GEODE-8742: fix list gateways command when dispatcher-threads is set …

timeline.message: GEODE-8742: fix list gateways command when dispatcher-threads is set to 1

timeline.bodyText: Instead of hard-coding the gfsh command, would it be possible to use CommandStringBuilder with the static strings found in CliStrings here?
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.message: using CommandStringBuilder instead of hard-coding command

timeline.bodyText:
If you use the CommandStringBuilder class with the addOption() method, you can avoid having to manually put in the dashes and equals signs, like so:
String command = new CommandStringBuilder(CREATE_GATEWAYSENDER)
        .addOption(CREATE_GATEWAYSENDER__ID, "ln_Serial")
        .addOption(CREATE_GATEWAYSENDER__REMOTEDISTRIBUTEDSYSTEMID, "2")
        .addOption(CREATE_GATEWAYSENDER__DISPATCHERTHREADS, "1")
        .getCommandString();

This helps make commands easier to read and reduces the chance of typos when writing them.
timeline.author: DonalEvans

replies.bodyText: Nice! I take a look on test above, so I do on this way, but this proposal is better.
replies.author: mkevo
